Class WordFactory

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Factory in charge of creating SmartWord objects

      • WordFactory

        public WordFactory(StrokeFactory strokeFactory,
           IWordUserParamsFactory wordUserParamsFactory)
        Create an instance of a WordFactory
        Parameters:
        strokeFactory - The StrokeFactory used for the creation of stroke.
        wordUserParamsFactory - The WordUserParamsFactory used for the creation of the user params. This is also used in the serialisation/deserialisation of the word

      • createTypesetWordsFromLabel

        public List<SmartWord> createTypesetWordsFromLabel(String label,
                                          String locale,
                                          float x,
                                          float y,
                                          IUserParams defaultCharacterUserParams,
                                          int spaceBefore)
        Create a list of SmartWord from a label.

        This is the way of creating a word from a label. It could be the case of a copy(cut)/paste feature from outside the application.

        Parameters:
        label - String representing the label of the word to be created.
        locale - String representing the system local.
        x - Word bounding rectangle abscissa.
        y - Word bounding rectangle ordinate.
        defaultCharacterUserParams - User parameters to be set to all the word characters.
        spaceBefore - The new number of space before the word
        Returns:
        the list of SmartWord created form the given parameters.

      • createWordWithUserParams

        public SmartWord createWordWithUserParams(SmartWord word,
                                 List<IUserParams> userParams,
                                 int spaceBefore)
        Create a copy of the given SmartWord associating it new given list of UserParams

        In case of a typeset word the timeStamps will be shifted to the time this method is called. If the userParams count is different from the characters count or the strokes count the method will return null.

        Parameters:
        word - Original word.
        userParams - The list of user parameters to be set.
        spaceBefore - The new number of space before the word
        Returns:
        Word copied with given user parameters.

      • createCopyOfWord

        public SmartWord createCopyOfWord(SmartWord word,
                         int spaceBefore)
        Creates a copy of the given SmartWord
        In case of a typeset word the timeStamps will be shifted to the time this method is called.
        Parameters:
        word - Original word.
        spaceBefore - The new number of space(s) before the word
        Returns:
        Word copied.

      • createSubWord

        public SmartWord createSubWord(SmartWord word,
                      int begin,
                      int end,
                      int spaceBefore)
        Creates a sub SmartWord from a given word.
        Parameters:
        begin - Start index to consider among word characters.
        end - End index to consider among word characters.
        spaceBefore - The new number of space(s) before the word
        Returns:
        Word created with the given parameters or null for an invalid request.

      • createMovedWord

        public SmartWord createMovedWord(SmartWord word,
                        float dx,
                        float dy,
                        int spaceBefore)
        Creates a SmartWord with the given translation values.
        Parameters:
        dx - Amount in the X direction to offset the word.
        dy - Amount in the Y direction to offset the word.
        spaceBefore - The new number of space(s) before the word
        Returns:
        Word created with the given parameters or null for an invalid request.

      • createScaledWord

        public SmartWord createScaledWord(SmartWord word,
                         float scaleX,
                         float scaleY,
                         int spaceBefore)
        Creates a SmartWord with the given translation values.


        Parameters:
        spaceBefore - The new number of space(s) before the word
        Returns:
        Word created with the given parameters or null for an invalid request.

      • createTransformedWord

        public SmartWord createTransformedWord(SmartWord word,
                              Transform transform,
                              int spaceBefore)
        Creates a SmartWord with the given translation values.
        Parameters:
        transform - The new transform applied to the word.
        spaceBefore - The new number of space(s) before the word
        Returns:
        Word created with the given parameters or null for an invalid request.

      • createTypeSetWord

        public SmartWord createTypeSetWord(SmartWord word,
                          float x,
                          float y,
                          int spaceBefore)
        Creates a typeset SmartWord from a given ink word.


        This is the way to typeset a word using the component provided character box calculation feature.
        See SmartPage.replaceWord(SmartWord, SmartWord).

        Parameters:
        word - Original word.
        x - Word bounding rectangle abscissa.
        y - Word bounding rectangle ordinate.
        spaceBefore - The new number of space(s) before the word
        Returns:
        Word created form the given parameters or null for an invalid request.

      • createTypeSetWord

        public SmartWord createTypeSetWord(SmartWord word,
                          List<Rect> charBoxes,
                          float baseline,
                          float mideline,
                          int spaceBefore)
        Creates a typeset SmartWord from a given word.


        This is the way to typeset a word using an external way to compute the character boxes.
        See SmartPage.replaceWord(SmartWord, SmartWord).

        Parameters:
        word - Original word.
        charBoxes - The char boxes for the selected candidate.
        baseline - The base line position where the word will be typeset.
        mideline - The midline position used for the internal scaling of the characters in their boxes.
        spaceBefore - The new number of space(s) before the word
        Returns:
        Word created form the given parameters or null for an invalid request.

      • createWordWithSelectedCandidate

        public SmartWord createWordWithSelectedCandidate(SmartWord word,
                                        int selectedIndex,
                                        int spaceBefore)
        Creates a SmartWord by selecting a new candidate.


        This method applies on both ink or typeset words. The paint parameter will only be used
        in case of typeset word.

        Parameters:
        word - Original word.
        selectedIndex - The selected candidate index to set.
        spaceBefore - The new number of space(s) before the word.
        Returns:
        Word created from the given parameters.

      • createWordFromByteArray

        public SmartWord createWordFromByteArray(byte[] wordBytes)
        Creates a SmartWord from the given byte array coming from a previous serialization.

        Parameters:
        wordBytes - The vector of char (serialized word).
        Returns:
        SmartWord created from the bytes.

      • createMixWord

        public SmartWord createMixWord(SmartWord word,
                      List<Integer> charIndexTypeset,
                      int spaceBefore)
        Creates a SmartWord from the given word with the typeset chars.

        Parameters:
        word - Original word.
        charIndexTypeset - The characters index to typeset. The other ones will be created with the original word stroke(s).
        spaceBefore - The new number of space(s) before the word.
        Returns:
        Word created from the given parameters.

        public StrokeFactory getStrokeFactory()
        Returns the associated StrokeFactory.
        Returns:
        the associated StrokeFactory.
